programme.title: Fatale
programme.desc: A wild one-night stand plunges a sports agent into a deadly cat-and-mouse game with a police detective.

programme.desc: A wealthy woman wants to get rid of her cheating husband and offers money to a broke friend to murder him.

programme.desc: An author plots the murder of his wife - but her body is never found, and he’s convinced she’s still alive.

programme.desc: Two college friends team up to uncover the truth about a classmate who was murdered many years before.

programme.desc: A police psychologist works to talk down an ex-con who is threatening to jump from a Manhattan hotel rooftop.

programme.desc: A gang of thieves plan a heist during a hurricane, but a cop tries to force everyone inside to evacuate.
